title: BC怎么添加子服？
author: __MineCraft__
txt_content: 我有一个起床战争服务端，想把这个端添加到BC里，但不知道怎么添加，怎么办？急！在线等

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
?
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25566
    restricted: false
  server1:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25567
    restricted: false
  server2:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25568
    restricted: false
  server3:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25569
    restricted: false
  server4:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25570
    restricted: false
复制代码
按格式往下复制即可 
localhost:填子服端口

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
配置文件
server list
加一个服务器名和ip地址端口即可
